endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of real estate properties based on provided search criteria such as location, price range, and property type.
Fetch detailed information for a specific property identified by its unique ID.
Add a property to a user's list of favorite properties for easy reference.
Retrieve the user's list of favorite properties.
List available amenities by location or property category.
Access multimedia resources, such as images and videos, for a specific property.
Submit an inquiry regarding a specific property, including user contact details and questions.
View the user's submitted inquiries and their statuses.
Retrieve information on developers and companies associated with the properties.
List available locations or regions for real estate searches.
